H0.text: The planets rotate around the sun, which best describes the motion of the planets in the solar system that contains Earth.

H1.text: The sun rotates around the planets in the solar system that contains Earth, which is composed of a sun and planets.

H2.text: The planets revolve around the sun is the statement that best describes the motion of the planets in our solar system, which contains Earth, a sun, and other planets.

H3.text: The sun revolves around the planets is the statement that best describes the motion of the planets in our solar system.

A4.text: As a result of the formation of the Solar System, planets and most other objects orbit the Sun in the same direction that the Sun is rotating.

A5.text: The orbits of Solar System planets are nearly circular.
